name: tally-system-2.0
description: Full-stack inventory management system for tracking chicken parts

scripts.start: node -e "console.log('Use start-all.bat (Windows) or ./start-all.sh (Unix) to start all services')"
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && if exist venv\Scripts\activate.bat (call venv\Scripts\activate.bat && alembic upgrade head && uvicorn app.main:app --reload) else (echo Virtual environment not found. Please run: cd backend && python -m venv venv && venv\Scripts\activate && pip install -r requirements.txt)
scripts.start:web: cd web && if not exist .env (echo VITE_API_URL=http://localhost:8000/api/v1 > .env) && npm run dev
scripts.install:backend: cd backend && python -m venv venv && venv\Scripts\activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:web && npm run install:mobile
